def main():
    r = int(raw_input())
    i = 0
    while i < r:
        t = int(raw_input())
        next_palindrome(t)
        i += 1


def is_palindrome(s):
    center = len(s)//2
    i = 0
    
    while i < center  :
        if s[i] == s[-(i +1)]:
            i += 1
        else:
            return False
    return True

    
def next_palindrome(n):
    t = n + 1
    if is_palindrome(str(t)):
        print(t)
    else:
        next_palindrome(n+1)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
